Detailed Description

Is used graphical operations on the Device-Context and defines the color and the style of a pen.

void Pen::SetColorHsv (  UINT8  hue,
UINT8  saturation,
UINT8  value,
UINT8  alpha = 255
)  [inline]
 

Sets the color of the pen to the value represented by hue, saturation and the value. Optionally an alpha-channel can be specified.

void Pen::SetColorRgb (  UINT8  red,
UINT8  green,
UINT8  blue,
UINT8  alpha = 255
)  [inline]
 

Sets the color of the pen to the value represented by red-, green- and blue-portions. Optionally an alpha-channel can be specified.
